flawed_nl_solution:
On Tuesday, 120 books were taken out 250 - 120 = <<250-120=130>>130 books
On Wednesday, 35 books were returned 130 + 35 = <<130+35=156>>156 books
On Thursday, 15 books were borrowed 156 - 15 = 141 books

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 165, not 156. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
